paper_abstract: We consider the problem of determining the symmetric tensor rank for symmetric tensors with an algebraic geometry approach. We give algorithms for computing the symmetric rank for 2 x...x 2 tensors and for tensors of small border rank. From a geometric point of view, we describe the symmetric rank strata for some secant varieties of Veronese varieties. (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Computing symmetric rank for symmetric tensors
